summary:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Dot, your personalized AI buddy, is calling it quits.
• Users can download their chat logs until September 30, so grab those memories.
• The team is scattering, but some are sticking around to work on new projects.

Impact — Dot’s demise marks the end of an era for AI companions, leaving users to find new digital friends.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://techcrunch.com/2025/09/05/personalized-ai-companion-app-dot-is-shutting-down/
